name: wpappxyz
author: oldcwj

sections.description: This plug-in is a REST-API plug-in expansion. When you want to get the time Posts, featured_image field not return a detailed picture address, if you want to address the need for a detailed request to do it again. So amended as direct access to image addresses. While adding the offset field for paging get posts.
sections.installation:
WordPress Admin Method

  1. Go to you administration area in WordPress Plugins > Add
  2. Look for wpappxyz (use search form)
  3. Click on Install and activate the plugin
  4. Find the settings page through Settings > wpappxyz

FTP Method

  1. Upload the complete wpappxyz folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Find the settings page through Settings > wpappxyz

short_description: This plug-in is a REST-API plug-in expansion.
description: This plug-in is a REST-API plug-in expansion. When you want to get the time Posts, featured_image field not return a detailed picture address, if you want to address the need for a detailed request to do it again. So amended as direct access to image addresses. While adding the offset field for paging get posts.
